OP		 	  src1		  src2		 result		zcv
0	AND		ff00ff00	00000000	00000000	 4
1	OR		ff00ff00	ff00ff00	ff00ff00	 0
2	ADD		ffffffff	00000001	00000000	 6
6	SUB		7fffffff	00000001	7ffffffe	 2
2	ADD		40000000	40000000	80000000	 1
6	SUB		A0000000	60000000	40000000	 3
7	SLT		fffffffe	ffffffff	00000001	 0
7	SLT		00000000	00000001	00000001	 0
7	SLT		A0000000	60000000	00000001	 0
7	SLT		60000000	A0000000	00000000	 4
C	NOR		00000000	00000000	ffffffff	 0
C	NOR		00010001	00010000	fffefffe	 0
